img.alt: Minnesota State High School League Spring Activities Cancelled for Remainder of 2019-2020 Season

a.span: Minnesota State High School League Spring Activities Cancelled for Remainder of 2019-2020 Season

div.p: Thursday, April 23, 2020, Minnesota Governor Tim Walz and the Minnesota State High School League announced the cancellation of all of Minnesota high school activities ...

a.title: Go to comments for Minnesota State High School League Spring Activities Cancelled for Remainder of 2019-2020 Season

img.alt: Minnesota Schools Closed for Remainder of 2019-2020 School Year

a.span: Minnesota Schools Closed for Remainder of 2019-2020 School Year

div.p: Thursday, April 23, 2020, Minnesota Governor Tim Walz and Minnesota Department of Education Commissioner Mary Cathryn Ricker announced the extension of Minnesota school closures through the end of the school year, Friday, June 5, 2020...

a.title: Go to comments for Minnesota Schools Closed for Remainder of 2019-2020 School Year
